description:
Showcase of a Custom Container-Validator executed in the cluster.

It will check that the Start is before the End value.

For the Java implementation check out [ExampleContainerValidatorSchema.java](https://bitbucket.lab.dynatrace.org/projects/RX/repos/cluster/browse/shared/settings.monitoring.impl/src/main/java/com/dynatrace/settings/monitoring/impl/internalapi/schemas/customvalidation/ExampleContainerValidatorSchema.java)

It is closely linked to the json schema, you have to use the constraint on the type in the json file, and the containerTypeIdentifier in the Java class has to correspond with that type name. see [ExampleContainerValidator.schema.json](https://bitbucket.lab.dynatrace.org/projects/RX/repos/cluster/browse/shared/settings.monitoring.impl/src/main/settings-schemas/custom_validation/ExampleContainerValidator.schema.json)

range.description: A number range with a custom container validation attached to it.

NumberRange.description: A number range. Start must be before End.

end.description: End of the range. Must be after Start.
